item.title: 3å·æ¯
item.description: A sense of family responsibility â€‹ As we grow up and our parents grow older, we have to realize that a sense of family responsibility should pay an important role in dealing with our family members. â€‹ One the one hand, we should notice that it was our family that gave us life, raised us up and made us who we are today. â€‹ One the other hand, being responsibility for our family is undoubtedly a necessary value should be shared by all of us Chinese and passed on to the next generations. è·èŠ±éª„é˜³ä¸æƒ§ã€å‡ºæ·¤æ³¥è€Œä¸æŸ“ï¼š Lotus, it does not fear the strong sunshine and keeps clean in the dirty soil. å¹¿å‘Šï¼šä½œæ–‡å¾é›† æœ‰ä¸€è¯´ä¸€ï¼Œæ²¡ç´ æåœæ›´äº† è”ç³»æ–¹å¼ï¼šQQâ€œç»¿è‰²
